Sentences: その撤去費用は 100 万円に及んだ
Translation: The cost of removing it was one million yen.

Sentences: 世界記録にはわずかに及ばなかった
Translation: The world record was not even close.

Sentences: 行きたくない人は行くに及びません
Translation: If you don't want to go, don't go.

Sentences: わざわざ電話していただくには及びません
Translation: It's not worth the trouble of calling.

Sentences: その結果は私たちの期待には及ばなかった
Translation: The results did not meet our expectations.

Sentences: わざわざホテルまで迎えに来ていただくには及びません
Translation: We didn't bother to pick him up at the hotel.

Sentences: 苦痛で彼の顔が歪んでいる
Translation: His face was contorted in pain.

Sentences: その花瓶は形がいびつに歪んでいる
Translation: The vase is twisted into an awkward shape.

Sentences: 時々テレビの画面が歪む
Translation: Sometimes the TV screen is distorted.

Sentences: 彼の家はたくさんの高いビルに囲まれている立っている
Translation: His house is standing surrounded by many tall buildings.

Sentences: その庭は木のフェンスで囲まれていた
Translation: That yard was surrounded by a wooden fence.

Sentences: 私の町は高い山に囲まれている
Translation: My city is surrounded by high mountains.

Sentences: 森に囲まれた湖
Translation: Lake surrounded by forest

Sentences: 敵部隊の四方を囲む
Translation: Surrounding enemy troops on all sides

Sentences: 文字を丸で囲む
Translation: Enclose letters with circles

Sentences: ブロック塀で家を囲む
Translation: Surround the house with block walls

Sentences: その像は石を刻んで作ったものだ
Translation: That statue was carved out of stone.

Sentences: アルプスの景色はわたしの胸に刻まれた
Translation: The view of the Alps is engraved in my heart.

Sentences: その石は刻まれて大きな像になった
Translation: The stone was carved into a large statue.

Sentences: 机に自分の名前の頭文字を刻む
Translation: Carve the first letter of your name on your desk.

Sentences: 細かく刻む
Translation: chop up into small pieces

Sentences: キャベツを刻む
Translation: Chop the cabbage.

Sentences: 金庫[自動販売機]から金を盗む
Translation: Stealing money from a safe [vending machine

Sentences: 部屋を空けている間にラップトップを盗まれた
Translation: Having your laptop stolen while you are out of the room

Sentences: 眠っている間に財布を盗まれた
Translation: My wallet was stolen while I was asleep.
